runs.comm: nicely flighted and Shehzad defends it to the offside
moves back and makes room to cut this shorter ball well but into the cover field
A little shorter and he goes back to defend it again
flighted ball on the off stump and pushes it back to the bowler
oh, he's had enough of defensive play. Uses all the flight of that ball and hoists it straight over long on for a massive six
just back of a length and seams away from Jamshed's tentative prod. Comfortably beaten
oh, its the leg glance again and Zimbabwe go up in appeal. The ball was angled into Jamshed's body and he moves across to the off side to dab it down to fine leg but misses it and is called a wide
outside off and seaming just a bit away, beats Jamshed's drive
outside edge. good length ball on and around off, Jamshed camps on his backfoot and gets a thick edge down to third man
full and on the pads to the right-hander this time. Shehzad can't get a bat on it as it trickles away from the keeper
good, accurate ball on the stumps and Shehzad has no trouble defending it
starts down leg and seams further away. Easy call for the umpire
Full and inviting outside off. Shehzad comes forward confidently and hits it down to mid-off to end the over
Fullish and angling down leg. he clips it nicely off his pads into straight midwicket
short of a length outside off. He goes back and blocks it well
oh, there's some intent. Comes down the track and looks to give it the old heave ho through the off side, but a little away movement beats him
stays back in the crease and dabs the length ball on off into the covers
edged and four through third man. Nice and full ball, with just a hint of shape away, Jamshed looks for the expansive drive and is fortunate to have the ball streak off fine of short-third man
back of a length on off stump and he is squared up a little as he pushes it out into the off side
Fullish ball, angled away from the right-hander and he comes forward to defend it
A little back of a length and he sways back to punch it through the covers
opens the face to that back of a length ball and rides the bounce to hit that ball down to deep third man
Dropped Good ball, short of a length and swinging away. Jamshed has a slash at it and the ball flies to slip where Masakadza dives from his position at first slip but cant get it.
digs it in and he swivels on his back foot to pull it off to deep square leg
short again and its Jamshed does one better as he swivel pulls it well over the square leg fence. Zimbabwe already being made to pay for their mistake
Just outside off and the batsman wants nothing to do with it
not this time. Shehzad has an Afridi-like swing at this length ball on off stump but can't connect as it sails over the stumps
he's tighter now. full on off and it gets the dead bat
shorter ball, darting in just a little and Shehzad is quick on the pull again down to deep square leg
leg stump full toss and treated as such. Sweetly timed flick off his pads and the ball runs off to the midwicket boundary
on the pads again. Jamshed clips it to wide mid-on off the back foot
shortish and Jamshed is too quick on the pull this time. The ball hits his stomach and lands at his feet
not this time.  Lovely timing. Banged into the middle of the pitch and it stands up for Jamshed who obliges by sending it off to the square leg boundary.
better length from Masakadza. Full and on middle which Jamshed can only defend back to the bowler

Well taken. Good running catch from Chigumbura. Jamshed races down the track, looking to put the new bowler off, but he only manages to sky this shortish delivery wide of the man and mid-off who runs around and holds on to give Zimbabwe their first breakthrough
lovely, full flowing cover drive to this full ball outside off from Shehzad. He's looking in good nick
tucks this back of a length ball, angled into the batsman down to fine leg
flighted outside off and he drives it square on the off side
full and drifting into middle, Hafeez clips it to mid-on
nudges this well-flighted ball to mid-on again
comes down the track and drives it uppishly straight down the ground and to long-on
well bowled. this one goes on with the arm and gets the inside edge of Shehzad. It runs down too fine and goes off to the boundary
brings the length back and the batsman pushes it into the off side off the back foot
short and wide outside off. The batsman cant reach it with his cut shot. It would have been called a wide but the bowler has overstepped.
Short ball, miles over the batsman's head and its called wide again. Free hit still in play
and its the yorker this time, or just about. Hafeez brings his bat down and punches it down the ground and has timed it well. Long-on needs to run around and jump to his left to keep it in play
fullish on off and he drives it down the ground
and this time the cut shot reaches the ball and its timed well enough to beat the infield to hit the point boundary
better. fuller and at the stumps. Hafeez tries to work it into the leg side but gets a leading edge that drops short of the bowler
punches this full ball through the covers off the front foot
beautifully played. lofts this full ball outside off over the field at extra cover and it goes for a one-bounce four. Shehzad looking in prime form
good flight, just outside off and is defended to short cover
shorter this time and affords enough room for the batsman to go back and cut it to deep point
Shehzad moves outside leg stump to make room, but the bowler follows him and he can only dab it out into the off side off the back foot
full and angled into the pads gets the sweep shot down to deep square leg
he's seen it again. Hafeez was trying to reverse sweep, but Waller drags it down and angles it down leg to ensure Hafeez can't make much of it
oh, he's dragged this down too short and outside off and Hafeez moves back to punch it hard through point
its a little flatter and the ball is angled down leg. He tries to sweep and finds the man at fine leg
shorter and the batsman makes room for himself, but it isn't enough as he can hit it only as far as the in-field at the covers
good strike. full and filghted on middle and Shehzad comes down the track and lifts it over the bowler's head for a handsome six
works it down to long-on
pulls this one just back a bit and Hafeez gets a bit of an edge that carries dangerously close to the bowler. He dives hoping to collect it, but it's already bounced
plants his leg outside off and sweeps it down to square leg
comes down the track, but doesnt get to the pitch and the drive is hit back to the bowler
fetches this fullish ball from outside off with another sweep
well placed. Makes room for himself, the ball is a little short as well and he pierces the gap between point and cover

flighted and inviting. the batsman takes up the offer, comes down the track and lofts it over the top. But wait, is that a brilliant save? The fielder at long-on, Timycen Maruma, back-peddles and was on the edge of the rope when he leaps into the air and taps the ball into play. Its only two for Pakistan thanks to some wonderful athleticism
dabbed down the ground off the back foot
full and on the corridor outside off and he comes forward and pushes it down to long-off

He goes right across onto the off side for a scoop to this length ball and it has the fine leg fielder interested as he runs around but it falls just wide of him and he collects it off the first bounce
stays back and uses the room and short length of this ball to cut it to the point fielder
And the short square leg boundary comes into play. Fullish ball coming into the pads and Shehzad comes forward, almost on one knee and helps the ball on its way over the boundary for another six

makes the immediate adjustment and it almost gets the job done. Shehzad moves to the leg side to swipe this one over cover but misses it and it's whiskers away from the off stump as it goes to the keeper
short and wide again and he flat bats it straight down the ground
lovely use of the feet, even better placement. Gets to the pitch of this one and hoiks it right between long-on and deep midwicket for another four. Calculated assault from Shehzad here
Stays leg side of the ball and hits it out into the covers
full and on middle. Hafeez hits it back down the ground
tapped down to long-on
fires this one in on off and Shehzad turns it just behind square on the leg side
stays back and opens the face of the bat a little to guide it through the infield on the off side to get two runs
slower ball, he comes forward and opens the face to guide it to point
slower ball again, but this one doesn't pitch and Hafeez drives it calmly down to long-on for a single

and there it is. short and sitting up to be hit. Shehzad comes onto his front foot and in a typical baseball-swing, slams it to wide long-on, who dives but the ball is struck too powerfully and reaches the boundary. He's been very productive in that region.
full and on the pads, Shehzad squirts it off to deep midwicket
slower again, looked like the leg cutter, but he's lost his direction that he had in the earlier overs. the batsman nudges it off his hips to fine leg
shorter again and Shehzad pulls off the front foot down to deep midwicket and races through for the second run
Stays steady in his crease and hits this fullish ball down to long-off.
opens up his shoulders and hits it straight down the ground for long-on to tidy up
fired in and the slog sweep is too slow to connect
quick and fullish and he pushes it down the ground
comes down the ground, turns it into a full toss on middle and works it down to deep midwicket
Oh, rank bad ball. full toss at a lovely height and Hafeez goes down on one knee and powers it over cow corner. Another six for Pakistan
in the blockhole and he digs it out and the bowler leaps to his right to get a good hand to it
fullish ball, lifted striaght over the top down to long-on
in the slot and Shehzad obliges, putting this half-volley well over the straight boundary with a lovely full swing of the bat.
goes across the line. Full and just outside off and he's down on one knee hoping to hit it through midwicket
oh, just when he's striking it straight so well. he tries a reverse sweep but the ball, angled across the batsman beats him completely
well struck. that's more like it. Full ball on middle gets the full face of the bat and its struck powerfully enough to beat the men at the straight boundary
finds the block hole. The batsman looks to whip it, but only gets an inside edge onto his pads and as the ball squirts off to third man, they go through for a single
fullish ball and its hoisted straight over the top again down to long-on
full and darting into the pads. Hafeez flicks it off the front foot down to square leg
goes for the dab sweep, it hits the edges of the bat and goes back to the bowler as Hafeez looks around to see where the ball has gone
flicks this full ball on middle off to square leg again
stays leg side of the ball, which is nice and full on off. he plants the bat down and hopes to guide it down to third man, but doesn't get enough as the keeper Taylor runs forward to field it
carves this full ball over point for a single
good lengths from Masakadza, finding the blockhole again and the batsman gets just enough bat on it to guide it to third man
slower ball off the back of the hand and he comes down on one knee, almost beaten by it, but works it off to deep midwicket
this one's just a little off from the target and becomes a full toss, which Hafeez whacks it powerfully through midwicket
What a strike! That's fifty to Hafeez. Full toss, over knee high and Hafeez, so still at the crease, opens up his hips and slams this well over the square leg boundary for a towering six.
on target this time. wide yorker and the batsman squeezes it out to point. 15 off that over
carves the fullish ball just outside off to long-off

full and straight but its in the slot for the batsman to drive the ball straight, but its too straight and hits the stumps at the bowler's end. The ball runs off to long-off and the batsman scamper for a single
angled into the pads, not giving any room and he picks it off the front foot down to straight midwicket boundary
length ball and Shehzad pounces on it. Good balance on the crease and he pulls out the full swing of the bat, as he has done throughout his innings and hoists it over long-off this time

oh, he's mistimed this one. fullish ball just outside off and his almightly swing takes the outside half of the bat and goes high into the air towards the cover region. Two fielders converge but the ball lands right in the middle
gets down on one knee, opens the face to this full ball on off stump through the covers
length ball and its sent out of here. Shehzad goes to 92. Another six over long on. High, handsome and powerful
a lot fuller this time and he goes for a Dhoni-esque shot. Its not quite the helicopter, but he manages to hit it down to long-off and collects two runs. Poor fielding there
Full again, this time on leg and he strikes it off to deepmidwicket and tears off between the wickets to collect another double. He's four short of a century
full on leg and he flicks it off his pads down to deep fine leg, but it only gets the single and Shehzad punches his thigh and looks very disappointed.
full on middle and its dabbed calmly to long-off. Shehzad on strike now. Three more for his century
oh, he doesn't get it. Shehzad finishes on 98 as he clips this full ball with a lot of bottom hand  out to deep midwicket
